CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-4 To achieve high power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) , electrondonor polymers should have the following desirable characteristics : ( i ) good absorption spectral overlap with the solar spectrum , ( ii ) optimal energy level alignment with respect to electron - acceptor fullerene derivatives ( typically [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC 60 BM ) or [6,6]-phenyl-C71butyric acid methyl ester ( PC 70 BM ) ) to facilitate efficient exciton separation , ( iii ) formation of a nanoscale interpenetrating network of the polymer and fullerene domains inside the photoactive layer , and ( iv ) provision of effective charge transport carriers toward the electrodes.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| electrondonor polymers |
| the solar spectrum |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC60 BM) |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71butyric acid methyl ester (PC70 BM) |

Explanation:

1. electrondonor polymers
2. the solar spectrum (it is not a material but I included it as it is mentioned in the context of spectral overlap)
3. [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC60 BM)
4. [6,6]-phenyl-C71butyric acid methyl ester (PC70 BM)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC60 BM) |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71butyric acid methyl ester (PC70 BM) |

Explanation:

1. electrondonor polymers: This term is not a specific material name but a class of materials.
2. the solar spectrum: This is not a material name, it is a description of a range of electromagnetic radiation.
3. [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC60 BM)
4. [6,6]-phenyl-C71butyric acid methyl ester (PC70 BM)

These two are the only entities that can be clearly identified as material names in the given paragraph.
